A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This Movie is absolutely full of suprises and mystery that left me wanting ep 9 to hurry up and be in theaters. The only complaints abut the film would be Rose and finn\, whenever their time on the screen happened it felt like the movie came to a hault especially whenever rey and kylo were on screen which credit to both actors for powerhouse performances\, and also the purple haired lady was a bit of a stupid idea for the movie. But with those nit picks out of the way this movie is definitely worth the watch!!.
